info.abstract:
This component fits one of three student models (AFM, iAFM, or t-AFM) and returns student or KC learning curve fits represented graphically with one line in log-odds scale for each student/KC and numerically with learning rate and initial knowledge parameters for each student/KC.
The component offers three student models:
AFM is the Additive Factors Model and considers a slope and intercept for each KC, and an intercept for each student.
iAFM is the Individualized Additive Factors Model and considers a slope and intercept for each KC and for each student.
t-AFM is similar to iAFM but instead of considering opportunity count as the measure of progression over which slope is calculated, it uses total calendar time spent on practice.
See demo workflow.
